definition: to fail to grasp the main points
(negative prefix)/not/no
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to demand/to request/to coerce
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: You just haven't got it right.
It was a poor performance, full of inconclusive arguments and other commonplaces.
sentences.chinese: 课本不怎么样，尽是不得要领的论说和一些老生常谈。

sentences.english: All his attempts to unlock the car were futile, because he was using the wrong key.
sentences.chinese: 开车门，但都不得要领，因为他用错钥匙。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, they seem to be missing the point.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，他们似乎不得要领。

sentences.english: So many arguments are so pointless.
sentences.chinese: 因此许多争执都是不得要领的。

sentences.english: Nice answer though completely misses the point about U. S. troops stationed in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 答的好，但是对于美军驻扎朝鲜这一点不得要领。

sentences.english: Your observation is beside the question.
His explanation was not to the purpose.
Besides being vile and stupid, however, the editorial was beside the point.
sentences.chinese: 先不说这位编辑的无礼和愚蠢，他是完全不得要领。

sentences.english: But I think that debate is largely beside the point.
sentences.chinese: 但我认为，这样的辩论在很大程度上不得要领。

definition: to be unable to get in/to fail to find a proper approach to handling sth
pinyin: bu4 de2 qi2 men2 er2 ru4

definition: to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
to think hard/bitter thoughts/to pour out one's sufferings
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
to rack one's brains (for apt wording etc) (idiom)
to know that it is so but not why it is so (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 qi2 ran2 er2 bu4 zhi1 qi2 suo3 yi3 ran2
related.word: 知其然而不知其所以然

definition: to work hard while accomplishing little/to toil to no avail
to not know what sb is driving at/to be unintelligible
to turn over in one's mind (idiom); to think through from different angles/to ponder
to tweak one's ears and scratch one's cheeks (as an expression of anxiety, delight, frustration etc) (idiom)
to not know the reason/to not know what to do
to search one's guts and belly (idiom); to racks one's brains for a solution
banging away clumsily in all directions with no overall vision
pinyin: dong1 yi1 lang2 tou2 xi1 yi1 bang4 zi5

definition: to not fully understand/to only partly understand
to harp on/over and over/merely ring changes on a few terms
to toss and turn (sleeplessly)/again and again
